schema.title: FormationIntegrityTest
schema.description: A downhole pressure test performed in open hole to measure formation strength.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

WellboreID.title: WellboreID
WellboreID.description: Business natural key or code of the Wellbore to which this record belongs

HoleSectionID.title: Hole Section Identifier
HoleSectionID.description: Association to Hole Section in which FIT/LOT is performed

OperationsReportID.title: OperationsReportID
OperationsReportID.description:
Operations report where the FIT/LOT test operation is described. Populated from Operations Report - used to pull Rig Name via Rig associated to 
Report.

VerticalMeasurement.title: Vertical Measurement
VerticalMeasurement.description: The well vertical measurement elevation reference for  test MD and TVD.

TestDateTime.title: Test Date/time
TestDateTime.description: Date/time well integrity test was performed.

ShoeDiameter.title: ShoeDiameter
ShoeDiameter.description: Diameter of the Casing/Liner shoe set in previous hole section

ShoeMeasuredDepth.title: ShoeMeasuredDepth
ShoeMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of the Casing/Liner Shoe relative to Vertical Measure elevation

ShoeTrueVerticalDepth.title: ShoeTrueVerticalDepth
ShoeTrueVerticalDepth.description: True vertical depth of the Casing/Liner Shoe relative to Vertical Measure elevation

BottomHoleMeasuredDepth.title: Bottomhole Measured Depth
BottomHoleMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of the Wellbore bottomhole depth at time of the test relative to the Vertical Measure elevation

BottomHoleTrueVerticalDepth.title: Bottomhole True Vertical Depth
BottomHoleTrueVerticalDepth.description: True vertical depth of the Wellbore bottomhole at time of the test relative to the VerticalMeasure elevation

IsRiserless.title: Is Riserless
IsRiserless.description: Was the Formation Integrity test performed without a Riser (offshore wells only)

IsMPD.title: Is MPD
IsMPD.description: Was the Formation Integrity test performed with a Managed Pressure Drilling applied to the well

SurfaceMudWeight.title: Surface Mud Weight
SurfaceMudWeight.description: Mud Weight at surface at time of test

IsStaticMWMeasured.title: Is Static Mud Weight Measured
IsStaticMWMeasured.description: Was a static Mud Weight measured prior to test?

IsPermeableFormationInOH.title: Is Open Hole Formation Permeable
IsPermeableFormationInOH.description: Is there a permeable formation in the open hole segment at time of test?

StaticDownholeMudWeightSource.title: Static Downhole Mud Weight Source
StaticDownholeMudWeightSource.description: Source of Static Downhole Mud Weight

PWDCementOffsetPressure.title: PWD Cement Offset Pressure
PWDCementOffsetPressure.description: Pressure While Drilling  Offset Pressure from Cement Unit

SurfaceCalculatedInflectionPointDHPressu.title: Surface Calculated Inflection Point DH Pressure
SurfaceCalculatedInflectionPointDHPressu.description: Surface calculated Downhole Inflection Point Pressure

SurfaceCalculatedInflectionPointDHEMW.title: Surface Calculated Inflection Point Downhole Equivalent Mud Weight
SurfaceCalculatedInflectionPointDHEMW.description: Surface calculated Downhole Inflection Point Equivalent Mud Weight

SurfacePressureMaximumVolume.title: SurfacePressureMaxVolume
SurfacePressureMaximumVolume.description: Volume pumped at Maximum Surface Pressure Pressure

SurfaceCalculatedDHPressureMax.title: Surface Calculated DH Pressure Max
SurfaceCalculatedDHPressureMax.description: Surface calculated Downhole Inflection Point Pressure Maximum

SurfaceCalculatedDHEMWMax.title: Surface Calculated DH EMW Max
SurfaceCalculatedDHEMWMax.description: Surface calculated Downhole Inflection Point Equivalent Mud Weight Maximum

Surface5MinShutInTime.title: Surface 5 Minute Shut In Time
Surface5MinShutInTime.description: Surface Time at 5 minute shut in

Surface5MinShutInPressure.title: Surface 5Min ShutIn Pressure
Surface5MinShutInPressure.description: Surface Pressure at Surface 5 minute shut in time

SurfaceCalculated5MinDHShutInPressure.title: Surface Calculated 5 Minute Downhole Shut In Pressure
SurfaceCalculated5MinDHShutInPressure.description: Surface Calculated 5 Minute Downhole Shut In Pressure

SurfaceCalculated5MinDHShutInEMW.title: Surface Calculated 5 Minute Downhole Shut In Equivalent Mud Weight
SurfaceCalculated5MinDHShutInEMW.description: Surface Calculated 5 Minute Downhole Shut In Equivalent Mud Weight

SurfacePWDDeltaTime.title: Surface PWD Delta Time
SurfacePWDDeltaTime.description: Surface pressure while drilling delta time

PWDSensorMeasuredDepth.title: PWD Sensor Measured Depth
PWDSensorMeasuredDepth.description: Pressure While Drilling Sensor Measured Depth

PWDSensorTrueVerticalDepth.title: PWD Sensor True Vertical Depth
PWDSensorTrueVerticalDepth.description: Pressure While Drilling Sensor True Vertical Depth. Calculated from Definitive Survey using sensor MD.

IsPWDInflectionPoint.title: Is PWD Inflection Point
IsPWDInflectionPoint.description: Does Pressure While Drilling data include inflection point?

PWDInflectionPointTime.title: PWD Inflection Point Time
PWDInflectionPointTime.description: Pressure While Drilling Inflection Point Time

PWDInflectionPointVolume.title: PWD Inflection Point Volume
PWDInflectionPointVolume.description: Pressure While Drilling Inflection Point volume (calculated).

PWDInflectionPointEMW.title: PWD Inflection Point EMW
PWDInflectionPointEMW.description: Pressure While Drilling Inflection Point Equivalent Mud Weight (calculated).

PWDMaxPressurePulsed.title: PWD Max Pressure Pulsed
PWDMaxPressurePulsed.description: Maximum pressure pulsed from Pressure While Drilling sensor

PWDMaxPressure.title: PWD Maximum Pressure
PWDMaxPressure.description: Maximum pressure measured from Pressure While Drilling sensor after  tool download.

PWDMaxPressureEMW.title: PWD Maximum Pressure EMW
PWDMaxPressureEMW.description: Pressure While Drilling Maximum Pressure Equivalent Mud Weight.

PWDMaxPressureTime.title: PWD Maximum Pressure Time
PWDMaxPressureTime.description: Time of Pressure While Drilling maximum pressure

PWDMaxPressureVolume.title: PWD Maximum Pressure Volume
PWDMaxPressureVolume.description: Volume pumped at Pressure While Drilling maximum pressure

PWD5MinShutInEMW.title: PWD 5 Minute Shut In EMW
PWD5MinShutInEMW.description: PWD 5 Minute Shut In Equivalent Mud Weight (calculated)

PWDAdjustedSurfaceInflectionPointPressur.title: PWD Adjusted Surface Inflection Point Pressure
PWDAdjustedSurfaceInflectionPointPressur.description: Surface pressure adjusted for pulsed up PWD pressure

PWDAdjustedSurfaceInflectionPointEMW.title: PWD Adjusted Surface Inflection Point EMW
PWDAdjustedSurfaceInflectionPointEMW.description: PWD Adjusted Surface Inflection Point Equivalent Mud Weight

PWDAdjustedSurface5MinEMW.title: PWD Adjusted Surface 5 Minute EMW
PWDAdjustedSurface5MinEMW.description: PWD Adjusted Surface 5 Minute Equivalent Mud Weight

WellboreMarkerID.title: Wellbore Marker ID
WellboreMarkerID.description:
Association to Marker within Wellbore 
Marker Set (MarkerID)

IsExtendedHole.title: Is Extended Hole
IsExtendedHole.description: Test performed while drilling hole section (not shoe test)

OpenHoleLength.title: Open Hole Length
OpenHoleLength.description: Length of Open Hole below shoe.

IsLCMUsedInTest.title: Is LCM Used In Test
IsLCMUsedInTest.description: Is Lost Circulation Material in fluid during test

IsTestContinuous.title: Is Test Continuous
IsTestContinuous.description: continuous test indicator. N = Step Test.

HoleInclination.title: Hole Inclination
HoleInclination.description: Wellbore Inclination of open hole. Interpolated from Definitive Survey using MD.

HoleAzimuth.title: Hole Azimuth
HoleAzimuth.description: Wellbore Azimuth of open hole. Interpolated from Definitive Survey using MD.

PumpedVolume.title: Total Pumped Volume
PumpedVolume.description: Total pumped volume at end of test

ReturnedVolume.title: Returned Volume
ReturnedVolume.description: Volume returned at end of test

InjectedVolume.title: Injected Volume
InjectedVolume.description: Injected volume during test. Calculated = Pumped - Returned Volume

ExpectedTestGradient.title: Expected Test Gradient
ExpectedTestGradient.description: Pre-test required formation strength, Limit Required.

TestDataQualityIndicator.title: Test Data Quality Indicator
TestDataQualityIndicator.description: Test Data Quality Indicator. True = Representative of formation response

InterpretedSurfacePressureMaximum.title: Interpreted Surface Pressure Maximum
InterpretedSurfacePressureMaximum.description: Interpreted Surface Inflection Point Pressure Maximum

InterpretedSurface5minShutInPressure.title: Interpreted Surface 5 Minute ShutIn Pressure
InterpretedSurface5minShutInPressure.description: Interpreters Surface 5 Minute Shut In Pressure

SmoothingWindowPWD.title: Smoothing Window PWD elapsed time
SmoothingWindowPWD.description: Smoothing Window Pressure While Drilling elapsed time

SmoothingWindowPWDShiftTime.title: Smoothing Window PWD Time Shift
SmoothingWindowPWDShiftTime.description: Time shift between surface and PWD data

MPDPriorBackPressureESD.title: MPD Prior Back Pressure ESD
MPDPriorBackPressureESD.description: Managed Pressure Drilling Prior Back Pressure Equivalent Static Density

MPDInflectionPointPressure.title: MPD Inflection Point Pressure
MPDInflectionPointPressure.description: Managed Pressure Drilling Inflection Point Pressure

MPDDeltaPressureMax.title: MPD Delta Pressure Maximum
MPDDeltaPressureMax.description: Managed Pressure Drilling Delta Pressure maximum

CementInflectionPointDownholeEMW.title: Cement Inflection Point Downhole EMW
CementInflectionPointDownholeEMW.description: Cement Inflection Point Downhole Equivalent Mud Weight

CementMaxPointDownholeEMW.title: Cement Max Point Downhole EMW
CementMaxPointDownholeEMW.description: Cement Max Point Downhole Equivalent Mud Weight

Cement5MinShutInPointDownholePressure.title: Cement 5 Min ShutIn Point Downhole Pressure
Cement5MinShutInPointDownholePressure.description: Cement 5 Min ShutIn Point Downhole Pressure

Cement5MinShutInPointDownholeEMW.title: Cement 5 Min ShutIn Point Downhole EMW
Cement5MinShutInPointDownholeEMW.description: Cement 5 Min ShutIn Point Downhole Equivalent Mud Weight

VolumePressureResponses.title: Time v Volume v Pressure response curve
VolumePressureResponses.description: Time v Volume v Pressure response curve(s)

items.title: VolumePressureResponse
items.description: Volume pumped versus Pressure response curve data. Multiple curves supported, one set for each Pressure Data Source

ChokeAOpenPercent.title: Choke A Open Percent
ChokeAOpenPercent.description: Choke A Open in fixed % (percent) unit. No unit conversion supported.

ChokeBOpenPercent.title: Choke B Open Percent
ChokeBOpenPercent.description: Choke B Open in fixed % (percent) unit. No unit conversion supported.
